meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! It's time to get our groove on and review Men of War II!

As I dive into this World War II real-time strategy game, I'm reminded of SpazioGames' words: "Men of War II is a RTS game with an incredible deep gameplay..." Yeah, that's about right! But don't worry; I won't make you feel like you need a Ph.D. in gaming to enjoy it (although COGconnected does mention that fans of the original will find it a worthy sequel). Nope, this review is for anyone looking for a good ol' fashioned RTS experience!

Now, let's get to the nitty-gritty! The UI might be a bit wonky at times (PC Gamer calls it "flawed but rewarding"), and some controls can be clunky (Cubed3 agrees). But hey, who doesn't love a challenge? And did you know that 3DJuegos thinks Men of War II is one of the best RTS games out there? Yaaas, I'm feeling the hype!

GameSpew says it takes a little work to get into, but once you do, it's all about exploring your own strategies and having fun! And don't even get me started on IGN Italia â€“ they're absolutely blown away by this game! (I mean, who wouldn't be with those graphics and realism?)

All in all, Men of War II is a solid RTS that'll keep you busy for hours on end. So grab some popcorn, put on your thinking cap, and get ready to take the battlefield by storm!

Hippo Penny out!
